name: ORPHA
description:
Install instructionsFOR PYTHON SORCES

REQUIRED

  python3, pip3 and all packages in requirements.txt

  For Linux: xterm

FOR RUN THE GAME IN TEXT MODE
  1) Install python required packages: "pip3 install -r requirements.txt"
  2) Run the game: "python orpha.py"

FOR RUN THE GAME IN 2D-GRAPHIC MODE
